host.title: Host
host.description: Hostname or IP address of the Oracle database server.

port.title: Port
port.description: Port number on which the Oracle database is listening.

username.title: Username
username.description: Username for authenticating with the Oracle database.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the Oracle database user.

max_threads.title: Max Threads
max_threads.description: Maximum concurrent threads for data sync

retry_count.title: Retry Count
retry_count.description: Number of sync retry attempts using exponential backoff

mode.title: SSL mode
mode.description: Database connection SSL configuration (e.g., SSL mode)

sid.title: SID
sid.description: The Oracle database SID to connect to.

service_name.title: Service Name
service_name.description: The Oracle database service name to connect to.
